channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: Israeli security forces said t
item.description: Israeli security forces said they were carrying out ‘a counterterrorism operation to thwart terror’ in Jenin and Tulkarm

item.title: The Gallagher brothers announc
item.description: The Gallagher brothers announced they are putting their past behind them 15 years after a back stage brawl split up the band

item.title: Joseph Nicolls also pleaded gu
item.description: Joseph Nicolls also pleaded guilty to sending a threatening email to a company which provides cameras for the scheme.
